description: Production-set change policy gate for runtime_math. Every module in the production manifest must have explicit admission/retirement evidence across governance, linkage, value-proof, and retirement policy artifacts.

admission_requirements: classification entry required for every manifest module
linkage entry required for every manifest module
research tier modules remaining in manifest require active retirement waiver and migration-wave entry

change_gate.update_rule: Any production manifest set change must update this digest and pass this gate with complete admission/retirement evidence.
